refnamediv.refpurpose: graph with nodes corresponding to edges

listitem.para: graph data structure of the new graph

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: line_graph returns the graph g1 with the nodes corresponding to the edges of the graph g. g1 is defined in the following way: - its nodes correspond to the edges of g - 2 nodes of the new graph are adjacent if and only if the corresponding edges of the graph g are adjacent.
The coordinates of the nodes of g1 are given by the middle points of the corresponding edges of g.
